nodes.text: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections

Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections is the fourth installment of the Incredible Cross-Sections series of reference books published by Dorling Kindersley on April 2, 2005. Written by Curtis Saxton and illustrated by Hans Jenssen and Richard Chasemore, the book provides in-depth cross-sections and illustrations of over a dozen starships and vehicles from the film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. The book's content was later republished in 2007 as part of Star Wars: Complete Cross-Sections, a compilation of the entire Cross-Sections series.

Because the hard details of the set of Padmé Amidala's J-type star skiff for Revenge of the Sith were not developed until late in production of the film, they could not be included in the Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections.
